# replace

**Type Property**

A behavior that replaces any currently opened immersive environment with the new scene.

## Declaration

```swift
static var replace: ImmersiveEnvironmentBehavior { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this value with the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Scene/immersiveEnvironmentBehavior(_:)] scene modifier to define that the system should hide the system’s immersive environment before opening the scene.
title: replace
